pkgmetadata.longdescription: Density Ratio Estimation // Density ratio estimation. The estimated density ratio function can be used in many applications such as the inlier-based outlier detection, covariate shift adaptation and etc. The implemented methods are uLSIF (Hido et al. (2011) doi:10.1007/s10115-010-0283-2) and KLIEP (Sugiyama et al. (2007) doi:10.1007/s10463-008-0197-x).
